text: Comet Klinkerfues may refer to the following comets, all discovered by Ernst Friedrich Wilhelm Klinkerfues: * C/1853 L1 (a.k.a. 1853 III) * C/1854 L1 (a.k.a. 1854 III) * C/1854 R1 (a.k.a. 1854 IV) * C/1857 M1 (a.k.a. 1857 III) * C/1857 Q1 (a.k.a. 1857 V) * C/1863 G1 (a.k.a. 1863 II)
title: Comet Klinkerfues
